title: AED Game Character Voice - Wizard
description: Unleash your inner magic with The Wizard, a bold and wise character who wields the forces of the mystical and the mighty!
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Album Art by Dalton Webb


AED Game Character Voice - Wizard voice-over sound library provides you with more than 275+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding game-play audio experiences.Â 


The Wizard's voice profile is rich, weathered, baritone with a tinge of the ancient and wizened. He is perfect for heroes, shopkeepers, advisors and other in-game non-player characters. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in clean audio format in case you want to further process with vocals effects.


Features:


-Vocal Profile: Male, Rich, Deep, Baritone, Aged

- Perfect for NPC's in game and/or film based trailers.

-Featuring custom lines and NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's MOBA and RTS games.

-Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping and pain vocalizations to fully flesh out your next hero or villain in game!

-Works with any DAW or Game Engine

- Royalty Free and YouTube friendly

- Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Features:

Male voice-over audio files

48.7 MB of voice samples

All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format


Number of Audio Waves: 282


Number of Audio Cues: 282


Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit


Do Sound FX loop: No


Windows: Yes


Mac: Yes
